comment: HEAR ME OUT.  Read the book and you'll get an A. Don't be lazy. If you rely on any teacher on the material for this course and not the textbook, then the statewide final would be hard for you.  She is fair, straightforward, and gives so much extra credit it is not even funny. As i may have had the highest grade with a 109, it is because I read.
Great teacher overall. Go to her office hours and she will help you with all the labs. I always went to her and I got As on all of the labs!
